name: Popcorn, Month 1
description:
Popcorn, Month 1 was created for the Eggplant Podcast Community Game Jam #11. The theme was “Learning To Let Go.”

Credits:

Brendan McCracken - Concept, Design, Code 

Peter Karman - Music and Sounds

Special Thanks to user Docky on the Eggplant Discord for a few accessibility tips. Apologies to users everywhere that I didn’t spend more time on accessible features...yet.

Tools:

Adaptive Sound by FMOD for Unity

Most graphics were made with the wonderful Shapes library by Freya Holmer

Sky textures from 3DJungle

Fonts from Google Fonts:

Raleway by Matt McInerney, Pablo Impallari, Rodrigo Fuenzalida

Rubik Beastly by NaN, Luke Prowse

Anonymous Pro by Mark Simonson

Voices created with TTSMP3
